A fee of {{creationFee}} will be deducte: A fee of {{creationFee}} will be deducted from the sender since the destination account does not exist
Add a tip to this extrinsic, paying the: Add a tip to this extrinsic, paying the block author for greater priority
Adding an optional tip to the transactio: Adding an optional tip to the transaction could allow for higher priority, especially when the chain is busy.
Do not include a tip for the block autho: Do not include a tip for the block author
Estimation does not account for the tran: Estimation does not account for the transaction weight
Fees includes the transaction fee and th: Fees includes the transaction fee and the per-byte fee
Fees of {{fees}} will be applied to the: Fees of {{fees}} will be applied to the submission
Fees totalling {{fees}} will be applied: Fees totalling {{fees}} will be applied to the submission
If you unlock it in advance within the l: if you unlock it in advance within the lock limit, you will be charged a penalty of 3 times the KTON reward.
Include an optional tip for faster proce: Include an optional tip for faster processing
Multisig approval with hash (not message: Multisig approval with hash (not message with call)
Multisig message with call (not approval: Multisig message with call (not approval with hash)
Override any applicable values for the s: Override any applicable values for the specific signed output. These will be used to construct and display the signed transaction.
Present the QR code containing the signa: Present the QR code containing the signature to the UI. Once scanned it will be submitted for on-chain processing and execution.
Scan the QR code with your QR scanner. O: Scan the QR code with your QR scanner. Once approved, you will be required to present the signed QR back to the UI for submission.
Set to 0 to make transaction immortal: Set to 0 to make transaction immortal
Submitting this transaction will drop th: Submitting this transaction will drop the account balance to below the existential amount ({{existentialDeposit}}), which can result in the account being removed from the chain state and its associated funds burned.
The deposit is below the {{minimum}} min: The deposit is below the {{minimum}} minimum required for the proposal to be evaluated
The deposit of {{deposit}} will be reser: The deposit of {{deposit}} will be reserved until the proposal is completed
The details of the transaction including: The details of the transaction including the type, the description (as available from the chain metadata) as well as any parameters and fee estimations (as available) for the specific type of call.
The final recipient balance is less or e: The final recipient balance is less or equal to {{existentialDeposit}} (the existential amount) and will not be reflected
The multisig signatory for this transact: The multisig signatory for this transaction.
The selected account does not exist on y: The selected account does not exist on your keyring
The selected account does not have the r: The selected account does not have the required balance available for this transaction
The sending account that will be used to: The sending account that will be used to send this transaction. Any applicable fees will be paid by this account.
The signatory is one of the allowed acco: The signatory is one of the allowed accounts on the multisig. The transaction could either be the call or an approval for the hash of a call.
This account does have a reserved/locked: This account does have a reserved/locked balance, not taken into account
Unlock the sending account to allow sign: Unlock the sending account to allow signing of this transaction.
